choose.when: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT num,writer,title,content,views, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM notice WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (num, title, writer, regdate, views, content) VALUES (notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0, #{content})
